string.text: 变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪gravity, chemical anomaly.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the first of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪chemical anomalies.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the second of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪gravitational anomalies.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the third of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪thermal anomaly.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the fourth of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪psi static anomalies.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the fifth of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪thermal anomalies.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the sixth of the anomalies located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 拿走扫描仪electrostatic anomalies.
For work on improving the anomaly detector technician Novikov requires the necessary scanner measurements. Go to the seventh and final anomaly located on the Creek and take the scanner.
变异点扫描仪: 送给诺维科夫所有扫描仪.
All seven 变异点扫描仪 have been found. Take them to the bunker scientists technician.
魔鬼花朵: 对话科学家.
Miguel rassvetovskomu scout needed rare artifacts - 魔鬼花朵. Talk with scientists about this at their bunker.
魔鬼花朵: 在亚诺夫车站收集信息.
Need to get as much information from the inhabitants of Janov about the mysterious artifact.
魔鬼花朵: 找到神器.
信息表明神器只出现在热力特异点. 可能在河湾或木星. 收集 3 个魔鬼花朵.
魔鬼花朵: 送给客户
Bring to Miguel obaschannye artifacts.
战队要务: 拿防具

Nazar has instructed you to do to strengthen the positions of the clan in the neighborhood of Jupiter. The primary objective of this is to form a stalker caches. To begin take your old equipment Novikov bronekostyumy Clear Sky to repair them and bring in a valid state.
战队要务: 等到诺维科夫完成
Technique needs some time to deal with repairing bronekostyumov. Use it with advantage - look for other components needed to fill caches.
战队要务: 拿走防具
Novikov bronekostyumov made repairs. Take his work.
战队要务: 填满5个补给箱
需要补充5个补给箱,标注在地图上,列表如下: 1) 武器: AN-94 'Abakan' 或 SG SIG 550 或 温彻斯特M1300之一. 并放入一组相应弹药. 2) 探测器'维尔斯'. 4) 防具CHN-3A. 5) 任何药箱, 任何绷带, 辐射药或PSI药物. 全部放入后请关闭背包在附近走两步.
战队要务: 补给箱northwest of CAT
Caches, attach all necessary Nazar from the above list.
战队要务: 补给箱the west of the plant Jupiter
Caches, attach all necessary Nazar from the above list.
战队要务: 补给箱south of the East Tunnel
Caches, attach all necessary Nazar from the above list.
战队要务: 补给箱south of the Cement
Caches, attach all necessary Nazar from the above list.
战队要务: 补给箱north of the Depot Containers
Caches, attach all necessary Nazar from the above list.
战队要务: 紧急跟着PDA信号
Nazar told you about the disappearance of patrol. Hurry up to a point marked on the map in time to render all possible assistance.
战队要务: 检查第一个点
Rassvetovtsev patrol was destroyed. The cause of death is 还没 clear. Check out a few points on their route - 也许 it will help to establish the truth.
战队要务: 检查第二个关键处
Checking the base point from ZRH Volkhov did not produce results, perhaps even, it would be possible to clarify the point of the study in an abandoned train ...
战队要务: 检查最后地方

In an abandoned part of the note was found Goodwin - the leader of the patrol group. He said it noticed by the strangeness of the Present Primechenie he findings patrol near the railway tunnel. Check it out, too.
战队要务: 立即报告情况
It seems that a tunnel is nothing unusual found. But ...
木星模组: 需要工具
Go to the Skadovsk and ask Nimble about delivery of the tools that are necessary for the job.
木星模组: 等待信使
Nimble has solved the problem of a shortage of equipment by courier. Wait for his arrival.
木星模组: 去拿信使
Go to meet with the courier somewhere to the North of Yanov station.
木星模组: 检查第一组电子模块
Go to the 木星工厂 and use the special tool kit to remove what you are interested in from the module.
木星模组: 检查第二组电子模块
Go to the 木星工厂 and use the special tool kit to remove what you are interested in from the second module.
木星模组: 检查第三组电子模块
Go to the 木星工厂 and use the special tool kit to remove what you are interested in from the third module.
木星模组: 跟着信号
Follow the signal coming from the courtyard by the plant. Check what is there.
木星模组: 撤退到安全距离
The courier who gave you the tools has suddenly appeared here. From his words it is clear that he was attacked and he can not be saved. From what you can make out you need to leave the area.
木星模组: 对话佣兵
The body of the courier had been mined. You narrowly avoided death. Nearby there was a squad of mercenaries. You should ask them what is going on.
木星模组: 杀死佣兵
The courier was killed by mercenaries. Do not let them kill you and take your cargo.
木星模组: 拿模组给基
The mercs have been 消灭. Try to get your cargo to the customer as quickly as is possible.
捕手要求: 找五个吸血鬼触须
Trapper has asked you to find 5 bloodsucker tentacles and bring them to him.
捕手要求: 送回物品
Now you have the tentacles Trapper wanted you need to deliver them to him.
血捕: 杀沼泽吸血鬼
A group of bloodsuckers has been spotted in the area of the Fen anomaly, close to the cement factory. Trapper has asked you to 消灭 them.
血捕: 追杀沼泽吸血鬼
The bloodsuckers have been busy claiming more territory, You need to strike at the heart of that new territory.
血捕: 去完成工作
All that is left is to track and kill the last surviving bloodsucker from this den.
血捕: 领取奖励
The swamp bloodsuckers are dead. You should collect the reward put up by local stalkers from Trapper.
